title: Electrode pole piece and electrochemical device comprising the electrode pole piece

events.title: Application filed by Ningde Amperex Technology Ltd

classifications.description: Processes of manufacture of electrodes based on carbonaceous material, e.g. graphite-intercalation compounds or CFx
Rocking-chair batteries, i.e. batteries with lithium insertion or intercalation in both electrodes; Lithium-ion batteries
Methods of deposition of the material by coating on electrode collectors
Silicon or alloys based on silicon

Selection of substances as active materials, active masses, active liquids of inorganic oxides or hydroxides of nickel, cobalt or iron of mixed oxides or hydroxides containing iron, cobalt or nickel for inserting or intercalating light metals, e.g. LiNiO2, LiCoO2 or LiCoOxFy
Oxygenated metallic salts or polyanionic structures, e.g. borates, phosphates, silicates, olivines
Carbonaceous material, e.g. graphite-intercalation compounds or CFx for inserting or intercalating light metals
Composites in the form of layers, e.g. coatings
Carriers or collectors characterised by shape or form
Physical characteristics, e.g. porosity, surface area

abstract: The present application relates to electrode pads and electrochemical devices including the electrode pads. The anode sheet described in the present application includes an anode first region and an anode second region, wherein the capacity per unit area Cs A2 of the second anode region is greater than or equal to the capacity per unit area Cs A1 of the first anode region. The cathode electrode sheet described in this application includes a cathode first region and a cathode second region, wherein the per unit area capacity Cs C2 of the cathode second region is less than or equal to 98% of the per unit area capacity Cs C1 of the cathode first region . When the anode electrode sheet and/or the cathode electrode sheet described in the present application is applied to an electrochemical device, the formation of lithium dendrites can be effectively reduced, and the safety of the electrochemical device can be improved.
abstract_original: 本申请涉及电极极片和包含所述电极极片的电化学装置。本申请所述的阳极极片包括阳极第一区和阳极第二区，其中所述阳极第二区的单位面积容量CsA2大于或等于所述阳极第一区的单位面积容量CsA1。本申请所述的阴极极片包括阴极第一区和阴极第二区，其中所述阴极第二区的单位面积容量CsC2小于或等于所述阴极第一区的单位面积容量CsC1的98％。当将本申请所述的阳极极片和/或阴极极片应用于电化学装置时，能够有效地降低锂枝晶的形成，改善电化学装置的安全性。
claims:
1.一种阳极极片，其包括阳极第一区和阳极第二区，1. An anode plate comprising an anode first region and an anode second region,
      
      
         其中所述阳极第二区的单位面积容量CsA2大于或等于所述阳极第一区的单位面积容量CsA1。The capacity per unit area Cs A2 of the second anode region is greater than or equal to the capacity per unit area Cs A1 of the first anode region.

2.根据权利要求1所述的阳极极片，其中所述阳极第一区包括所述阳极极片的主体区，所述阳极第二区包括所述阳极极片的边缘区。2. The anode sheet of claim 1, wherein the anode first region comprises a bulk region of the anode sheet and the anode second region comprises an edge region of the anode sheet.

3.根据权利要求1所述的阳极极片，其中所述阳极第二区的阳极极片的厚度小于所述阳极第一区的阳极极片的厚度。3. The anode sheet of claim 1, wherein the thickness of the anode sheet in the second region of the anode is less than the thickness of the anode sheet in the first region of the anode.
4.根据权利要求1所述的阳极极片，其中所述阳极第一区和所述阳极第二区分别包括不同的阳极活性物质。4. The anode sheet of claim 1, wherein the anode first region and the anode second region respectively comprise different anode active materials.

5.根据权利要求1所述的阳极极片，其中5. The anode sheet of claim 1, wherein
      
      
         所述阳极第一区的阳极活性物质的理论比容量小于所述阳极第二区的阳极活性物质的理论比容量。The theoretical specific capacity of the anode active material in the first region of the anode is smaller than the theoretical specific capacity of the anode active material in the second region of the anode.

6.根据权利要求1所述的阳极极片，其还包括阳极第三区，6. The anode sheet of claim 1, further comprising an anode third region,
      
      
         其中所述阳极第三区包括陶瓷。wherein the anode third region includes a ceramic.

7.根据权利要求1所述的阳极极片，其还包括阳极第四区，7. The anode sheet of claim 1, further comprising an anode fourth region,
      
      
         其中所述阳极第四区的单位面积容量CsA4大于或等于所述阳极第二区的单位面积容量CsA2。The unit area capacity Cs A4 of the fourth anode region is greater than or equal to the unit area capacity Cs A2 of the anode second region.

8.一种阴极极片，其包括阴极第一区和阴极第二区，8. A cathode pole piece comprising a cathode first region and a cathode second region,
      
      
         其中所述阴极第二区的单位面积容量CsC2小于或等于所述阴极第一区的单位面积容量CsC1的98％。The unit area capacity Cs C2 of the second cathode region is less than or equal to 98% of the unit area capacity Cs C1 of the cathode first region.

9.根据权利要求8所述的阴极极片，其中所述阴极第一区包括所述阴极极片的主体区，而所述阴极第二区包括所述阴极极片的边缘区。9. The cathode sheet of claim 8, wherein the cathode first region comprises a bulk region of the cathode sheet and the cathode second region comprises an edge region of the cathode sheet.

10.根据权利要求8所述的阴极极片，其中所述阴极第二区的阴极极片的厚度小于所述阴极第一区的阴极极片的厚度。10. The cathode sheet of claim 8, wherein the thickness of the cathode sheet in the second region of the cathode is less than the thickness of the cathode sheet in the first region of the cathode.

11.根据权利要求8所述的阴极极片，其中所述阴极第一区和所述阴极第二区分别包括不同的阴极活性物质。11. The cathode sheet of claim 8, wherein the cathode first region and the cathode second region respectively comprise different cathode active materials.

12.根据权利要求8所述的阴极极片，其中所述阴极第一区包括三元材料和/或钴酸锂，而所述阴极第二区包括磷酸铁锂。12. The cathode pole piece of claim 8, wherein the cathode first region comprises a ternary material and/or lithium cobalt oxide, and the cathode second region comprises lithium iron phosphate.

13.根据权利要求8所述的阴极极片，其中13. The cathode sheet of claim 8, wherein
      
      
         所述阴极第一区的阴极活性物质的理论比容量大于所述阴极第二区的阴极活性物质的理论比容量。The theoretical specific capacity of the cathode active material in the first region of the cathode is greater than the theoretical specific capacity of the cathode active material in the second region of the cathode.

14.根据权利要求8所述的阴极极片，其还包括阴极第三区，14. The cathode pole piece of claim 8, further comprising a cathode third region,
      
      
         其中所述阴极第三区包括陶瓷。wherein the cathode third region comprises ceramic.

15.根据权利要求8所述的阴极极片，其还包括阴极第四区，15. The cathode pole piece of claim 8, further comprising a cathode fourth region,
      
      
         其中所述阴极第四区的单位面积容量CsC4小于或等于所述阴极第二区的单位面积容量CsC2。The capacity per unit area Cs C4 of the fourth region of the cathode is less than or equal to the capacity Cs C2 per unit area of the second region of the cathode.

17.根据权利要求16所述的电芯，其中所述阳极极片为权利要求1-5中的任一者所述阳极极片和/或所述阴极极片为权利要求8-13中的任一者所述的阴极极片。17. The cell according to claim 16, wherein the anode electrode sheet is the anode electrode sheet and/or the cathode electrode sheet is any one of the claims 1-5 in the claim 8-13 The cathode electrode sheet of any one.

18.根据权利要求16所述的电芯，其中所述阳极极片还包括阳极第三区和/或阳极第四区，18. The cell according to claim 16, wherein the anode electrode sheet further comprises an anode third region and/or an anode fourth region,
      
      
         其中所述阳极第三区包括陶瓷，wherein the anode third region comprises ceramic,
      
      
         其中所述阳极第四区的单位面积容量CsA4大于或等于所述阳极第二区的单位面积容量CsA2。The unit area capacity Cs A4 of the fourth anode region is greater than or equal to the unit area capacity Cs A2 of the anode second region.

19.根据权利要求16所述的电芯，其中所述阴极极片还包括阴极第三区和/或阴极第四区，19. The cell according to claim 16, wherein the cathode electrode sheet further comprises a cathode third region and/or a cathode fourth region,
      
      
         其中所述阴极第三区包括陶瓷，wherein the cathode third region comprises ceramic,
      
      
         其中所述阴极第四区的单位面积容量CsC4小于或等于所述阴极第二区的单位面积容量CsC2。The capacity per unit area Cs C4 of the fourth region of the cathode is less than or equal to the capacity Cs C2 per unit area of the second region of the cathode.
